name: Atonio Naivalu
story: Atonio grew up in a poor family in the Caribbean. He became involved in smuggling at a young age to make ends meet. His charming and persuasive personality quickly made him a valuable asset to the teams he worked with. He later joined the French Foreign Legion where he developed his tactical skills and became a Sergeant. Despite his success, Atonio still sees himself as a smuggler at heart and continues to work with various groups to move contraband across borders.
